DNS Parser
==========

**Status: beta**

[Documentation](https://docs.rs/dns-parser) |
[Github](https://github.com/tailhook/dns-parser) |
[Crate](https://crates.io/crates/dns-parser)

This is a parser of DNS protocol packets that is independent of any networking
code.
